control.control:
!IsEmpty(Window.Property(Daily.7.ShortDay)) 82 TWC.Daily.ListNoFocusTexture
TWC.Daily.ListDay [B]$INFO[Window.Property(Daily.7.ShortDay)][/B][CR][COLOR=grey2]$INFO[Window.Property(Daily.7.ShortDate)][/COLOR]
TWC.Daily.ListConditionTexture !StringCompare(Window.Property(Daily.7.LongDay),$LOCALIZE[16]) + !StringCompare(Window.Property(Daily.7.LongDay),$LOCALIZE[17])
TWC.Daily.ListConditionWeekendTexture StringCompare(Window.Property(Daily.7.LongDay),$LOCALIZE[16]) | StringCompare(Window.Property(Daily.7.LongDay),$LOCALIZE[17])
Weather image TWC.Daily.ListOutlookIcon special://skin/backgrounds/Weather/Icons/$INFO[Window.Property(Daily.7.FanartCode)] 100 false 0 BFFFFFFF keep >
TWC.Daily.ListOutlook $INFO[Window.Property(Daily.7.Outlook)]
TWC.Daily.ListHighTemp [B]$INFO[Window.Property(Daily.7.HighTemperature)]$INFO[System.TemperatureUnits][/B] !StringCompare(Window.Property(Daily.7.HighTemperature),n/a)
TWC.Daily.ListHighTemp [B]$INFO[Window.Property(Daily.7.HighTemperature)][/B] StringCompare(Window.Property(Daily.7.HighTemperature),n/a)
TWC.Daily.ListLowTempTexture !StringCompare(Window.Property(Daily.7.LongDay),$LOCALIZE[16]) + !StringCompare(Window.Property(Daily.7.LongDay),$LOCALIZE[17])
TWC.Daily.ListLowTempWeekendTexture StringCompare(Window.Property(Daily.7.LongDay),$LOCALIZE[16]) | StringCompare(Window.Property(Daily.7.LongDay),$LOCALIZE[17])
TWC.Daily.ListLowTemp $INFO[Window.Property(Daily.7.LowTemperature)]$INFO[System.TemperatureUnits] !StringCompare(Window.Property(Daily.7.LowTemperature),n/a)
TWC.Daily.ListLowTemp $INFO[Window.Property(Daily.7.LowTemperature)] StringCompare(Window.Property(Daily.7.LowTemperature),n/a)
TWC.Daily.ListPrecipitation $INFO[Window.Property(Daily.7.Precipitation),,%]
TWC.Daily.ListWindTexture !StringCompare(Window.Property(Daily.7.LongDay),$LOCALIZE[16]) + !StringCompare(Window.Property(Daily.7.LongDay),$LOCALIZE[17])
TWC.Daily.ListWindWeekendTexture StringCompare(Window.Property(Daily.7.LongDay),$LOCALIZE[16]) | StringCompare(Window.Property(Daily.7.LongDay),$LOCALIZE[17])
TWC.Daily.ListWind $INFO[Window.Property(Daily.7.WindDirection)][CR]$INFO[Window.Property(Daily.7.WindSpeed)]
